name: GUIDE CHARITABLE TRUST
briefDescription: 1.To establish, takeover, acquire and maintain manage and conduct,schools,colleges,training institutions,research and other educational instutions,hospitals or libraries for imparting and advancement of general,technical, profession.2.To run, establish and acquire Medical Colleges and Engineering Colleges for the poor.3.We are help and guide the people to get benefits from Government.4.We are conduct AIDS And HIV AWARENESS Program5.We are conduct EYE And General Medical camps on Rural.6.We are conduct Child Lapour Awareness program on city and rural.
